mouse.name: mouse_item
mouse.usage: transform silence into active,and active into silence(which means freeze mob and transform block into an entity)
mouse.sneak: (In Talisman Pocket)freeze effect immune and have chance to freeze attacker
mouse.erupt: Area transform(all mobs freeze and block back to block)
mouse.additional: during block transformation there will be drops; and some powerful mob cannot be frozen

ox.name: ox_item
ox.usage: Give you undefeated power and mining speed
ox.sneak: (In Talisman Pocket)almost infinite strength and haste effect
ox.erupt: High level strength and mining speed

tiger.name: tiger_item
tiger.usage: boost xp and make livings aggressive or peaceful
tiger.additional: who will need this to survive?

rabbit.name: rabbit_item
rabbit.approach: can be found in chest in some structures
rabbit.sneak: (In Talisman Pocket)infinite speed and jump effect

dragon.name: dragon_item
dragon.additional: keep in mind everything includes yourself as well,maybe there is a way to cancel that fire(hold ice in offhand)

snake.name: snake_item
snake.approach: can be found in chest in some structures
snake.additional: is this a little bit imbalance(In Talisman Pocket)
snake.sneak: (In Talisman Pocket)invisible and mobs within 8 blocks won't attack you(perhaps)

horse.name: horse_item
horse.sneak: (In Talisman Pocket)immune to all harmful effect
horse.erupt: heal more and remove harmful effect

sheep.name: sheep_item
sheep.sneak: exchange pos after tp;(In Talisman Pocket)...
sheep.erupt: ghost out of body and teleport back while sneaking(without dimension limit)

monkey.name: monkey_item
monkey.sneak: (In Talisman Pocket)have change to transform attacker into another mob

chicken.name: chicken_item
chicken.additional: with some kind of speed may give fly ability

dog.name: dog_item
dog.usage: give you regeneration and absorption effect
dog.sneak: (In Talisman Pocket)infinite resistance and regeneration effect
dog.erupt: flower grace, long life you are

pig.name: pig_item
pig.usage: blasting eyes, break blocks and damage mobs
pig.sneak: (In Talisman Pocket)smelt the block you are mining
pig.erupt: real blasting eyes, break blocks and damage mobs in line

golden_egg.name: golden_egg_item
golden_egg.usage: some kind of food with eurpt effect
golden_egg.approach: can be found in chest in some structures
golden_egg.additional: nice food, eat as much as you can

xp_pool.name: xp_pool_item
xp_pool.approach: can only be found in ghost tower or in a maze
xp_pool.additional: sometimes can even increase xp and boost xp drop when in hand and enchanted by xp boost
xp_pool.erupt: summon xp entity to drag all creature closer

buddha_palm_technique.name: buddha_palm_technique_item
buddha_palm_technique.approach: can be found in chest in some structures
buddha_palm_technique.additional: be careful to use(do you want to kill all mobs under the hand?)

bony_spur.name: bony_spur_item
bony_spur.usage: apply effect after using while have potion in offhand
bony_spur.approach: can only be found in ghost tower or in maze
bony_spur.attribute: increase attack damage after kill mobs

dart.name: dart_item
dart.additional: very useful and easy to craft

dragon_bow.name: dragon_bow_item
dragon_bow.approach: can only be found in ghost tower or in maze

sweepstakes.name: sweepstakes_item
sweepstakes.usage: use on lottery block to get a gift
sweepstakes.additional: even talisman could be a gift

water_origin_stone.name: water_origin_stone_item
water_origin_stone.usage: summon a still water block(in hand chain)

wind_origin_stone.name: wind_origin_stone_item
wind_origin_stone.usage: push away nearby mobs(in hand chain)

sky_origin_stone.name: sky_origin_stone_item
sky_origin_stone.sneak: give you flying effect for 90 seconds but has 60s cooldown

mountain_origin_stone.name: mountain_origin_stone_item
mountain_origin_stone.usage: allow you walk in the air(in hand chain)

ground_origin_stone.name: ground_origin_stone_item
ground_origin_stone.usage: break blocks in line(in hand chain)
ground_origin_stone.erupt: moving in the earth(press shift to go down)(sometimes it won't work as wished)

gravity_origin_stone.name: gravity_origin_stone_item
gravity_origin_stone.usage: control other mobs' position as you want(in hand chain)
gravity_origin_stone.sneak: make you have or remove your gravity
gravity_origin_stone.erupt: change moon phase to release devil qi

lighting_origin_stone.name: lighting_origin_stone_item
lighting_origin_stone.sneak: apply paralysis effect to nearby mobs and some damage as well
lighting_origin_stone.erupt: give you lei grace(will attack nearby mobs with lighting)

fire_stick.name: fire_stick_item
fire_stick.additional: this probably is not a weapon

wind_stick.name: wind_stick_item
wind_stick.usage: shoot wind ball(blow nearby mob up)

sky_stick.name: sky_stick_item
sky_stick.usage: call for sky grace(spawn random mobs)
sky_stick.erupt: call for real sky grace(only spawn iron golem)

ground_stick.name: ground_stick_item
ground_stick.usage: shoot stone gland(dig hole in random shape)(no drops)
ground_stick.erupt: shoot charged stone gland(dig hole at a certain shape)(have drops)

mountain_stick.name: mountain_stick_item
mountain_stick.usage: form a small mountain at random shape

gravity_stick.name: gravity_stick_item
gravity_stick.usage: shoot gravity ball(flow up nearby mobs)(hit mob will lose/have gravity)
gravity_stick.erupt: shoot charged gravity ball(apply gravity plus effect to nearby mobs)

lighting_stick.name: lighting_stick_item
lighting_stick.usage: shoot lighting ball(spawn lighting on hit pos)
lighting_stick.erupt: shoot charged lighting ball(spawn lighting on hit pos and nearby mobs)

hand_chain.name: hand_chain_item
hand_chain.usage: use devils power if you have their stone
hand_chain.sneak: accroding to the stone you choose
hand_chain.erupt: accroding to the stone you choose

talisman_pocket.name: talisman_pocket_item
talisman_pocket.usage: use to equip,will enhance your power with talisman inserted

tally.usage: give harmful effects to mobs nearby
tally.name: tally_item
